actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 with respect to the renewal of licenses for the operation of broadcasting stations.

summary.text: Excludes from coverage under the Food Stamp Act households whose principal wage earner is on strike due to a labor dispute. States that this provision is inapplicable to households which were eligible for and participating in the food stamp program prior to the start of the strike.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 with respect to the renewal of licenses for the operation of broadcasting stations.
